messages.body: Good morning. We need a consolidated order — coffee, tea, paper, sanitizer. Maybe balloons too.
Good morning. What quantities are you thinking?
8 bags coffee, 20 boxes tea, 40 reams paper, 24 sanitizer. Balloons we're not sure yet.
Coffee $25/bag, tea $12/box, paper $4/ream, sanitizer $8/bottle min 24. Balloons $3000/1000 when you're ready.
Correct. Single delivery?
Yes. December 5. But we might bump coffee to 10 bags and add 3000 balloons. Can you requote?
10 coffee $250, 20 tea $240, 40 paper $160, 24 sanitizer $192, 3 boxes balloons $9000. Total $9842.
Balloons are too expensive for this round. Drop balloons. Keep 10 bags coffee, rest same.
10 coffee $250, 20 tea $240, 40 paper $160, 24 sanitizer $192. Total $842.
Can we get a discount for the combined order?
For above $750 we can do 3% — $816.74.
We were hoping for 5%. We'll probably order again in January.
I can do 4% for this order — $808.32. If you confirm a January order of similar size we can look at 5% then.
Okay 4% for now. Single delivery Dec 5 to 100 Finance Ave.
PO reference and payment terms?
PO-2024-12-102. Net 30 from delivery.
Actually we need to reduce. Drop the paper — we'll get it elsewhere. So 10 coffee, 20 tea, 24 sanitizer only.
10 coffee $250, 20 tea $240, 24 sanitizer $192. Total $682. With 4% that's $654.72.
And tea — can we do 15 boxes instead of 20? Budget squeeze.
Hold on. We might need the paper after all. Add back 30 reams.
30 reams is fine. But can we push delivery to December 6? Our warehouse is tight on the 5th.
Dec 6 works. I'll note it.
Scratch that — keep Dec 5. We'll make it work.
Reverting to Dec 5.
Last month we had tea and paper from you. One tea carton was dented. No claim, but can you double-check packing?
We'll flag it. Multi-line orders are now picked and packed in one go to avoid mix-ups.
Invoice to accounts@company.com and procurement@company.com. Itemised please.
Will do. SO will list each line.
Do we get early payment discount? We sometimes pay within two weeks.
We offer 1% for payment within 14 days. Would apply to the net amount.
We'll stick to Net 30 for this one.
Understood. Receiving contact?
+65 9123 4567. Gate B, morning slot.
One more change — sorry. Can we add the paper back at 40 reams not 30? We recalculated.
40 reams $160. So 10 coffee, 15 tea, 40 paper, 24 sanitizer. Total $782. 4% = $750.72.
Yes. That's the final. We won't change again.
I'll generate SO-2024-1204 for those four lines, Dec 5, 100 Finance Ave.
When do you need order cut-off? In case we think of anything else.
Ideally 48 hours before delivery. After that we might not be able to add to the same truck.
We're also looking at balloons for a January event. Roughly how much for 5000?
5 boxes of 1000 = $15,000 list. We could quote with discount if it's part of a larger January order.
We'll come back on that. For now just this order.
Understood. SO on its way.
FOB Singapore and we use your truck, same as last time?
Yes.
Thanks. We'll confirm when we get the SO.
Actually — can we add 10 reams of paper to the order? We forgot one department.
Adding 10 reams: +$40. New total 10 coffee, 15 tea, 50 paper, 24 sanitizer. $822 before 4% = $789.12.
Wait, we said 40 reams paper. So it's 40 not 50. Sorry for the confusion.
So 40 reams. Total stays 10 coffee, 15 tea, 40 paper, 24 sanitizer. $782, 4% = $750.72. That was the last confirmed.
Yes. 40 reams. Don't add the 10.
Understood. 40 reams only.
Tea is 50 sachets per box right? We had a dispute with another supplier who sent 25.
Yes. Our Assam tea boxes are 50 sachets. It's on the spec sheet we can send with the order.
Sanitizer — is it the pump bottle or the flip cap?
500ml pump bottle. Same as last month.
Good. We prefer the pump for the dispensers.
If we add balloons later for the same Dec 5 delivery, is it too late?
We'd need to know soon — at least 5 days before — to get balloons on the same truck. Otherwise it would be a separate delivery.
We'll decide by end of week. Might skip balloons entirely for December.
No problem. Order stands as the four lines until you say otherwise.
Receiving will be different on Dec 5 — temporary guy. I'll send the name and number before the day.
Send when you have it. We'll put it on the delivery note.
Do you do next-day delivery if we run out of something before Dec 5?
We can do expedited for a fee. Lead time is usually 2–3 days for small top-ups. Ask when you need it.
Hope we don't need it. Thanks.
That's everything. We'll reply when we've got the SO.
